choose.when: SELECT c.course_code,c.course_name,c.course_attr,c.STU_SCORE,c.STU_HOUR,c.MAJOR_NAME,c.COLLEGE_NAME ,(case when pj.COURSE_CODE is not null then 1 else 2 end) isPj FROM DATA_STUDENT_COURSE sc LEFT JOIN DATA_COURSE c on c.COURSE_CODE = sc.COURSE_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COURSE_CODE,user_id FROM JXPJ_XSPJ ) pj on pj.COURSE_CODE = sc.COURSE_CODE and pj.user_id = sc.USER_ID WHERE sc.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT c.course_code,c.course_name,c.course_attr,c.STU_SCORE,c.STU_HOUR,c.MAJOR_NAME,c.COLLEGE_NAME ,(case when pj.COURSE_CODE is not null then 1 else 2 end) isPj FROM DATA_TEACHER_COURSE dtc LEFT JOIN DATA_COURSE c on c.COURSE_CODE = DTC.COURSE_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT COURSE_CODE FROM JXPJ_XSPJ ) pj on pj.COURSE_CODE = c.COURSE_CODE where dtc.USER_ID = #{userId}
choose.otherwise: SELECT c.course_code,c.course_name,c.course_attr,c.STU_SCORE,c.STU_HOUR,c.MAJOR_NAME,c.COLLEGE_NAME,1 as isPj FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT COURSE_CODE FROM JXPJ_XSPJ ) pj LEFT JOIN DATA_COURSE c on c.COURSE_CODE = pj.COURSE_CODE

mapper.insert: insert into JXPJ_XSPJ (CODE, TEMPLATE_CODE, COURSE_CODE, SUGGEST, USER_ID, USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE) VALUES (#{code},#{templateCode},#{courseCode},#{suggest},#{userId},#{userName},CURRENT_DATE)

insert all
INTO JXPJ_XSPJ_ITEM (RELATION_CODE,TEMPLATE_CODE,TARGET_CODE,ANSWER) VALUES(#{xspj.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xspj.templateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{val,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select 1 from dual
mapper.select: SELECT template_code,TARGET_CODE,target_content,target_score,score/stu_num as avg_score FROM ( SELECT pj.template_code,pj.TARGET_CODE,target_content,target_score ,count(DISTINCT USER_ID) stu_num ,sum(case when answer = '非常同意' then target_score when answer = '比较同意' then target_score*0.8 when answer = '一般' then target_score*0.6 when answer = '不太同意' then target_score*0.4 when answer = '不同意' then target_score*0.2 end) score FROM( SELECT TT.*,target_content,target_score FROM ( SELECT TEMPLATE_CODE FROM JXPJ_PJSET_TEMPLATE where TEMPLATE_TYPE = '学生评教' ) t LEFT JOIN JXPJ_PJSET_TEMPLATE_TARGET tt on TT.TEMPLATE_CODE = t.TEMPLATE_CODE LEFT JOIN JXPJ_PJSET_TARGET tg on tg.target_code = tt.target_code ) t2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pj.course_code,pj.template_code,target_code,answer,user_id FROM JXPJ_XSPJ pj LEFT JOIN JXPJ_XSPJ_ITEM pj2 on pj2.relation_code = pj.code ) pj on PJ.TEMPLATE_CODE = t2.TEMPLATE_CODE and pj.target_code = t2.target_code where pj.course_code = #{courseCode} GROUP BY pj.template_code,pj.TARGET_CODE,target_content,target_score )t3
SELECT suggest FROM JXPJ_XSPJ where COURSE_CODE = #{courseCode} and TEMPLATE_CODE = #{templateCode}

SELECT T2.COURSE_CODE "courseCode", T2.COURSE_NAME "courseName", T4.code "teacherCode", T4.name "teacherName" FROM DATA_STUDENT_COURSE T1 LEFT JOIN DATA_COURSE T2 ON T2.COURSE_CODE = T1.COURSE_CODE LEFT JOIN DATA_TEACHER_COURSE T3 ON T3.COURSE_CODE = T2.COURSE_CODE LEFT JOIN DATA_TEACHER T4 ON T4.CODE = T3.USER_ID WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}
